sentences.en: And you mean you can pirouette and all that sort of thing?
sentences.cn: 你是说你会转圈什么的?

sentences.en: Exit by flying away straight and level while continuing to pirouette.
sentences.cn: 结束时机体保持自旋水平直线飞行.

sentences.en: Half pirouette: The same as a pirouette, except executed only in a half - circle.
sentences.cn: 后肢半旋转: 类似一种单脚旋转, 但只转半圈.

sentences.en: Roy: You mean you can pirouette and all that sort of thing?
sentences.cn: 罗伊: 你的意思是你能“单脚着地旋转”和做诸如此类的动作?

sentences.en: She turned a pirouette on the ice.
sentences.cn: 她在冰上做了个单足旋转动作.

sentences.en: To picture this, imagine an ice skater doing a pirouette.
sentences.cn: 为了更加形象化，想像一下溜冰时旋转的场景吧。

trans.tran_cn: （芭蕾）皮鲁埃特旋转（竖趾旋转）
trans.tran_en: a dance movement in which the dancer turns very quickly, standing on one toe or the front part of one foot
